title: Gymnastics: Just about the best thing going
creator_credit: Film Australia, Frank Heimans, Peter Johnson and Cinetel Productions
brief_description: A film celebration of the sport of gymnastics. Australian young people, aged seven to fifteen, and others praise the activity as beneficial therapy for poor coordination, improvement of physical fitness, increasing self-confidence and making new friends. They also tell of the necessary discipline and hard work.
